descripcion: Hotel Duc de Saint Simon is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Paris, offering a romantic environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay.
Nearby landmarks such as Eiffel Tower (1.3 mi) and The Catacombs of Paris (1.6 mi) make Hotel Duc de Saint Simon a great place to stay when visiting Paris.

nombre: Hampton Inn Manhattan / Times Square Central
descripcion: At Hampton Inn Manhattan/Time Square Central, you'll be in the heart of the vibrant Times Square/Broadway area of Manhattan, close to theaters, shopping and dining. Enjoy easy access to the Port Authority Bus Terminal, Penn Station and subway lines that will take you to other areas of Manhattan and the boroughs. Walk to Rockefeller Center, Herald Square, Jacob Javits Convention Center and Madison Square Garden.

After a busy day at meetings or exploring Manhattan, retire to a comfortable guest room and relax in a clean and fresh Hampton bed®. Check emails using free WiFi at the spacious work space. Store your valuables in an in-room laptop-sized safe. Unwind watching your favorite programs on the 40-inch flat-screen TV. If you're bringing your family, request a high chair or crib for a more comfortable stay.
